metadata.title: CVE-2021-47154 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: The Net::CIDR::Lite module before 0.22 for Perl does not properly considerextraneous zero characters at the beginning of an IP address string, which(in some situations) allows attackers to bypass access control that isbased on IP addresses.

criterions.comment: libnet-cidr-lite-perl package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
